DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effect of renal function impairment on the single dose pharmacokinetics of Daclatasvir.
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacokinetic and Safety Study of Daclatasvir in Patients With Renal Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: Treatment, Parallel Assignment, Open Label, Non-Randomized, Single Dose Adaptive Design, Pharmacokinetics Study
DOC.criteria: Meet renal function criteria in one of four categories Unstable or uncontrolled medical conditions
